Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: assets of disposal group including discontinued operation current
prepaid expense and other assets current
Receivables: accounts and other receivables net current
receivables disposal group including discontinued operation
restricted receivables of variable interest entities

Long-term Investments: investments in affiliates subsidiaries associates and joint ventures
Other Non-Current Assets: assets of disposal group including discontinued operation noncurrent
disposal group including discontinued operation assets noncurrent
notes and loans receivable net noncurrent
operating lease right of use asset
restricted other assets of variable interest entities
regulatory assets related to income taxes
Property, Plant, and Equipment (net): accumulated depreciation depletion and amortization property plant and equipment
generation facilities to be retired net
property plant and equipment gross attributed to variable interest entities
public utilities property plant and equipment accumulated depreciation
public utilities property plant and equipment net
public utilities property plant and equipment plant in service

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Common Stock and APIC: additional paid in capital common stock

Other Current Liabilities: liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation current
Short-term Debt: notes payable related parties classified current

Deferred Tax Liabilities: deferred income taxes and other tax liabilities noncurrent
Long-term Debt: non recourse long term debt of variable interest entities
Other Non-Current Liabilities: liabilities of disposal group including discontinued operation noncurrent
liabilities other than longterm debt noncurrent
pension and other postretirement defined benefit plans liabilities noncurrent
total deferred credits and other liabilities

__unmapped__: minority interest amount represented by preferred stock
temporary equity carrying amount attributable to noncontrolling interest
